results.title: Tasmanian adventure
results.brief_description: A tour of the scenic highlights of Tasmania, showing the variety of scenery, and the many sports available to the visitor. Shows beaches, rivers, rainforests, and rugged mountains where people can swim, sail, fish, surf and ski.
results.description: A tour of the scenic highlights of Tasmania, showing the variety of scenery, and the many sports available to the visitor. Shows beaches, rivers, rainforests, and rugged mountains where people can swim, sail, fish, surf and ski.

results.title: Tasmania: its history its heritage
results.creator_credit: Peter Richman Productions and Peter Richman
results.brief_description: This video uses the architecture of yesteryear to analyse what it says about the social, cultural and economic history of Tasmania; Australia’s second oldest colony. There is a variety of architecture and classic buildings examined, from grand homes, public buildings, humble cottages and split paling cabins. Produced in consultation with the National Trust, Tasmania, this video will be enjoyed by anyone interested in historic buildings or the history of Tasmania.

results.title: Tasmania: Australia's apple isle
results.creator_credit: Tasmanian Government Film Unit and Norman Laird
results.brief_description: Apples grown in Tasmanian orchards appear in homes in distant parts of the world. This film gives an impression of the skill and care that goes into the growing of these apples, and in addition, shows much of the beauty of this southern isle. Narrated by Rex Waldron. Photography by Don Anderson.

results.title: Tasmania, a place for all seasons: winter
results.creator_credit: Tasmanian State Film Unit, Ray Barnes and Don Anderson
results.brief_description: This film shows snow sport, an antique auction, dining in luxury, the casino and many other activities which prove that Tasmania is a place to visit even in the winter time.

results.title: Tasmania is...
results.creator_credit: Tasmanian State Film Unit and Jane Bampton
results.brief_description: The activities and scope of the Directorate of Industrial Development and Trade are highlighted. Covers the broad spectrum of industry and looks at the social attitudes held by the Tasmanians themselves.

results.title: Tasmania's holiday highlands
results.creator_credit: Tasmania. Dept. of Film Production and Brian Merrett
results.brief_description: In the heart of Tasmania’s scenic highlands, a wealth of hydro-electric power is produced through twelve dams and power stations linked by rivers, canals, pipelines and tunnels. These beautiful natural and man-made lakes attract tourists of all kinds, especially hikers and salmon fishermen.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Tasmania. Dept. of Film Production and Brian Merrett

results.title: Tarzan: the collector's classic
results.creator_credit: Ashton Dearholt Expedition Pictures, Ben S. Cohen, Ashton Dearholt, George W. Stout, Edward Kull and Wilbur McGaugh
results.brief_description: This Tarzan collectors edition contains the full length feature “Tarzan and the Green Goddess” starring Olympic champion Herman Brix. Filmed on location in Guatemala, it details the adventures of Tarzan as he assists the expedition of Major Martling and Ula Vale and their quest to take the Green Goddess, a native totem believed to contain a secret formula for a super explosive, back to Livingston. After successfully finding the totem it is stolen by Raglan who is intent on using the formula for Hiram Power’s personal plots, thus disturbing the delicate balance of the jungle. With only Tarzan’s unique knowledge to rectify the chaos that has been unleashed, so follows the journey on the trail of Raglan. Tarzan and the expedition members must also combat a party of natives sent by the High Priest to avenge the tribe and retrieve the Goddess. This Tarzan collectors edition also contains bonus footage, extracts and out-takes from the films of three other well known Tarzan players, including the first actor to play Edgar Rice Burrough’s adventurous character, Elmo Lincoln.

results.title: Tarzan, the ape man
results.creator_credit: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and W S. Van Dyke
results.brief_description: Tarzan, a man raised from childhood by apes, meets Jane, a young English woman on safari with her father. Based on the characters created by Edgar Rice Burroughs. Cast includes Johnny Weissmuller, Neil Hamilton, C. Aubrey Smith, Maureen o’Sullivan.
